transport.question: I have wheels and go on the road, and I can take you far. What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 Many people drive me.
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 I can carry families.
🚦 You see me at stop lights.

transport.question: I float on water and can take you to different lands. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I need a big body of water to move.
⚓️ Pirates sometimes use me.
🚢 I am bigger than a canoe.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and have wings, and can take you to faraway places very quickly. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I fly very high up.
✈️ I can carry lots of people.
🛬 You need a runway for me to land.

transport.question: I go on tracks and carry many people. I stop at stations. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I follow a special path.
📣 People wait for me on platforms.
🚊 I am very long.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you use your feet to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 🚴 You need to balance to ride me.
🔔 I often have a bell.
🛣️ You can ride me on a path.

transport.question: I can fly straight up and down, and I have spinning blades on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I am smaller than an airplane.
🚨 You can use me for rescues.
⬆️ I can hover in the air.

transport.question: I am a car that helps people who are sick or hurt. What am I?

hints.text: 🚑 I have a siren.
🏥 I rush to the hospital.
🧑‍⚕️ I have doctors and nurses who ride in me.

transport.question: I carry lots of goods, and I have many wheels. What am I?

hints.text: 🚛 I am bigger than a car.
📦 I deliver packages.
🛣️ I drive on the highway.

transport.question: I go very fast and can take people into space. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I am very powerful.
👨‍🚀 Astronauts use me.
🌌 I can travel to the moon and other planets.

transport.question: I travel underwater and can explore the deep sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🐟 I go where the fish are!
🌊 I cannot float on the surface.
🤿 Scientists use me to explore the ocean.

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and I grow in the ground. I need water and sunshine to grow big and tall. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I start as a tiny seed.
🌻 You can find me in a garden or field.
🌷 I can be many different colors.

plant.question: I am green and have many leaves. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I am very tall.
🍃 I help give us air to breathe.
🐿️ Squirrels love to climb me.

plant.question: I am a fruit with a peel. Monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am yellow when I am ripe.
🍌 You can peel me and eat me.
😋 I am a tasty and healthy snack.

plant.question: I grow in the ground and I am orange. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable.
✨ I am good for your eyes.
🚜 Farmers grow me in their gardens.

plant.question: I am a big green plant with a hard shell. You can carve me for Halloween. What am I?

hints.text: 🎃 I am round and orange.
🕯️ People put candles inside me.
🥧 You can make a pie out of me.

plant.question: I am a plant that can stick to walls. I have green leaves and climb up high. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I like to grow on houses.
🍃 I am a type of vine.
💚 I can cover a wall in green.

plant.question: I am a tall plant that grows in fields. My kernels are yellow and make a yummy snack. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 You can pop me!
🚜 Farmers grow me a lot!
🍿 I am delicious with butter and salt.

plant.question: I have thorns and beautiful flowers. I am often given as a gift to someone you love. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I come in many colors: red, pink, and white.
🥀 Be careful, I have sharp points.
💐 I smell very nice.

plant.question: I'm a plant that grows tiny green balls that you can eat. I grow on a vine. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I am small and round.
🍷 I can be made into juice.
💜 I can be green or purple.

plant.question: I am a very tall tree with needles instead of leaves. Many people decorate me for Christmas. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 I stay green all year long.
🎁 You can put presents under me.
🌟 People put a star on top of me.
